profile_summary: Detail-oriented and organized Front Desk Assistant with over 3 years of experience in providing exceptional customer service, managing administrative tasks, and ensuring smooth office operations. Proven ability to handle high-volume customer requests efficiently while maintaining professionalism and courtesy. Committed to delivering high-quality results with little supervision.

description: Managed front office reception area and handled all office administrative tasks.
Answered and directed incoming calls, took messages, and provided information to callers.
Scheduled and confirmed appointments for clients, customers, or supervisors.
Maintained a clean and organized reception area to uphold the company's professional image.
Performed data entry tasks for sales figures, metrics, and other relevant data.
Assisted in the preparation of meetings and conference rooms.
achievements: Successfully handled a high volume of inbound calls and customer inquiries, leading to a 20% increase in customer satisfaction ratings.
